item.title: Selected Discography And Audio Works
item.description: The following is a semi-complete compendium of audio projects I have released or taken part in over the years. If you would like to hire me to produce a soundtrack for your game or film, or if your label would be interested in signing me, please email me. Radio Work Sarah Allen Reed And The Jazz Program 2021-present Host datafruits.fm The Forest At Night 2020-present Host

item.title: Editorial Roles, Columns, And Other Writings
item.description: Editorial Positions 3moon Magazine Art Director 2021-present BLACKWORK Editor and Publisher 2015-present Staff Writing Positions Bear Creek Gazette (Stuart M. Buck, editor) Cartoonist, “The Grizzly”, Issue 1-present 2021 Regular Appearances inxcomic (Greg Russell, editor) Issues 5-11 2020-2021 Anthology Pieces/Magazine Appearances Sleeping Village “Let The Waves Have Their Way: On Interpol And Black Metal” 2020 Zine Panique! (Yann Plane, editor)
